description: List of pairs (n,2n) where n is the least unused number so far.
comments: A permutation of the natural numbers. Inverse permutation is A065037.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
P. Erdős, R. Freud, and N. Hegyvári, Arithmetical properties of permutations of integers, Acta Mathematica Hungarica 41:1-2 (1983), pp 169-176.
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
mathematica: w = {}; Do[ w = If[ FreeQ[w, k], w = Join[w, {k, 2k}], w], {k, 100}]; w(* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 04 2011, after Wouter Meeussen *)
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (delete)a036552 n = a036552_list !! (n-1)a036552_list = g [1..] where   g (x:xs) = x : (2*x) : (g $ delete (2*x) xs)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 07 2011
crossrefs: Alternating merge of A003159 and A036554. Cf. A065037.
author: Tom Verhoeff (Tom.Verhoeff(AT)acm.org)
